E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 1/31/1987
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Romeo Ramirez



Date: Monday, 2/3/1987
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Toledo!

Regards,
Romeo Ramirez



Date: Saturday, 3/1/1987
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
RF Bobby Rayburn, SP Curtis Grahm
in return for
CF Shane Bosley.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
New Jersey GM

Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1987
Subject: Kenneth Howse learns new position
Kenneth Howse has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Keith Camper
Dear Sir,
Keith Camper has problems at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an ERA of 6.75, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Joel Deleon
Dear Sir,
Joel Deleon shouldn't play at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .237 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Tony Gann
Dear Sir,
Tony Gann isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .235, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 7/26/1987
Subject: Bill Dotts injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Knocked Out Teeth.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
